sentence.text: Probable interaction between acenocoumarol and levofloxacin: a case series.
To report five cases with a probable interaction between acenocoumarol and levofloxacin

In five patients on long-term acenocoumarol treatment who had had stable international normalized ratios for at least 6 months, sudden erratic changes in the values of these ratios were observed after 1
5-8 days of concomitant levofloxacin treatment with no other apparent cause

Closer monitoring should be considered in patients with concomitant use of acenocoumarol and levofloxacin, especially elderly patients and those with renal dysfunction who seemed to suffer the interaction more severely
